org.ninit.models.bm25
Class BM25TermScorer

java.lang.Object
  Scorer
      org.ninit.models.bm25.BM25TermScorer

public class BM25TermScorer
extends Scorer

Calculate the relevance value of a single term applying BM25 function ranking. The BM25Parameters k1, and b are used.

Author:
"Joaquin Perez-Iglesias"
